meanings.definition: A person who has been divorced.
meanings.sent1: After the divorce, she became a dyvours.

meanings.definition: To divorce or separate from a spouse.
meanings.sent1: They decided to dyvours after years of unhappiness.
meanings.sent2: Couples often dyvours due to irreconcilable differences.
meanings.sent3: She threatened to dyvours him if he didn't stop snoring.

meanings.definition: The act of divorcing or separating from a spouse.
meanings.sent1: The dyvours was finalized after months of legal proceedings.
